de.unlixx.runpng.util

Interface Loc.ChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Loc

    public static interface Loc.ChangeListener
    Change listener for changes of the current locale.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void localeChanged(java.util.Locale localeOld, java.util.Locale localeNew)
      This method will get invoked at implementors in case the locale changes.

    • Method Detail

      • localeChanged

        void localeChanged(java.util.Locale localeOld,
                   java.util.Locale localeNew)
        This method will get invoked at implementors in case the locale changes.
        Parameters:
        localeOld - The old Locale object.
        localeNew - The new Locale object.
